SEARCH
Package AcademicExchangePlatform.dao

Class CourseDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
AcademicExchangePlatform.dao.CourseDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
CourseDAO
public class CourseDAOImpl extends Object implements CourseDAO
Implementation of the CourseDAO interface. Provides methods to create, update, retrieve, and manage courses.
